APCS-R.BK.summary: Asia Precision Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells precision metal parts for automotive, office automation, heating ventilating, and air-conditioning industries in Thailand and internationally. The company also produces and sells metal spare parts; produces and distributes raw water; and distributes materials and spare parts for the construction of various structures. In addition, it offers engineering services and automation solutions; construction and maintenance services of renewable energy power plants; engineering design consulting services; and project construction and maintenance services for waste management facilities and public infrastructures. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

BM-R.BK.long_name: Bangkok Sheet Metal Public Company Limited
BM-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Sheet Metal Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes metal forming products in Thailand. It offers metal trunking and white conduit products; communication racks, cabinets, and enclosures; electrical switchboard and lighting fixtures; fabrication and metalworking products; and sheet metal, press, machine, and assembly parts. It also provides mold and die making products, machine tools, and equipment for building, condominium, office, shopping mall, industry factory, electrical power station, etc. The company offers its products under the BM, BSM, BS, and BEST brands. Bangkok Sheet Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

BM.BK.long_name: Bangkok Sheet Metal Public Company Limited

Bangkok Sheet Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

BTW-R.BK.long_name: BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited
BTW-R.BK.summary: BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in steel fabrication, energy production, power plants, and resources businesses in Thailand. It provides steel fabrication services for heavy industries sector, such as oil and gas, power, mining, and infrastructure. The company also offers installation and construction services for renowned engineering, procurement, and construction contractors, as well as project owners; and equipment and facility rental services for fabricators and constructors, as well as generates and supplies renewable energy. BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BTW.BK.long_name: BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited
BTW.BK.summary: BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in steel fabrication, energy production, power plants, and resources businesses in Thailand. It provides steel fabrication services for heavy industries sector, such as oil and gas, power, mining, and infrastructure. The company also offers installation and construction services for renowned engineering, procurement, and construction contractors, as well as project owners; and equipment and facility rental services for fabricators and constructors, as well as generates and supplies renewable energy. BT Wealth Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CITY-R.BK.summary: City Steel Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the manufacture and sale of metal structures, storage systems and material handling equipment, other metal products, and fabricated metal parts in Thailand. It also provides steel service center and processing services. The company's storage systems and material handling equipment consist of racking, modular, special, pipe rack, shelving, and conveyor systems, as well as mezzanine platform, cabinets and lockers, carts and dollies, pallets, and dock and handling equipment. Further, it sells metal products, industrial materials, and equipment. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand. City Steel Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WKP Asset Plus Company Limited.

FMT-R.BK.long_name: Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited
FMT-R.BK.summary: Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes seamless copper tubes in Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company offers smooth, multi-grooved, accumulator, and capillary copper tubes. Its products are used as components in air-conditioner and refrigerator equipment. The company was formerly known as Furukawa Metal (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited in November 2020. Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FMT.BK.long_name: Fine Metal Technologies Public Company Limited

KCM-R.BK.summary: K.C. Metalsheet Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal sheets for roofing and other applications in Thailand. It also sells manufactured goods under the contract with customers; provides roof installation services with metal sheets and various steel goods; and provides property rental services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand. K.C. Metal Sheet Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Charoenkij Group.

KCM.BK.summary: K.C. Metalsheet Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal sheets for roofing and other applications in Thailand. It also sells manufactured goods under the contract with customers; provides roof installation services with metal sheets and various steel goods; and provides property rental services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand. K.C. Metal Sheet Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Charoenkij Group.

SMPC-R.BK.long_name: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited
SMPC-R.BK.summary: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited manufactures and sells LPG and other pressure cylinders in Thailand and internationally. It offers LPG cylinders; automotive LPG cylinders; methyl bromide cylinders, refrigerant cylinders, lubricant cylinders, and specialty gas cylinders; and parts and components, such as spuds, valves, valve caps, collar/handles, and footrings. The company also provides container repairs and quality testing services; general body reconditioning services for damaged cylinders; paint coating services for cylinders; and valve replacement services. Its cylinders are used in household, recreational, industrial, energy, and automobile sectors. The company sells its products under SMPC name. Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMPC.BK.long_name: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited
SMPC.BK.summary: Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited manufactures and sells LPG and other pressure cylinders in Thailand and internationally. It offers LPG cylinders; automotive LPG cylinders; methyl bromide cylinders, refrigerant cylinders, lubricant cylinders, and specialty gas cylinders; and parts and components, such as spuds, valves, valve caps, collar/handles, and footrings. The company also provides container repairs and quality testing services; general body reconditioning services for damaged cylinders; paint coating services for cylinders; and valve replacement services. Its cylinders are used in household, recreational, industrial, energy, and automobile sectors. The company sells its products under SMPC name. Sahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

STPI-R.BK.summary: STP&I Public Company Limited engages in the steel fabrication works, and manufacture of boilers and pressure vessels in Thailand, Japan, Sri Lanka, and internationally. The company offers steel structures for airports, exhibition halls, and high-rise buildings; industrial plants, such as factories, automobile plants, and steel mills; power plants, including boiler structures and turbine buildings, as well as for equipment support structures; petrochemical plants consisting of refineries, and gas separation and aromatic plants; and bridges comprising built-in cable anchor structural decks, main structures, decking for cable stay bridges, flyovers, and pipe bridges jetties. It also provides piping pre-fabrication and erection services for various industrial plants, including power plants, oil refineries, petrochemical plants, offshore process plants, etc., as well as produces offshore and onshore modules. In addition, the company offers engineering services in the design of steel-to-steel connection, as well as shop and erection drawing services. Further, it provides fabrication services, such as cutting/rolling/drilling, assembly and welding, inspection, blasting and painting, and packing and delivery; and plant and module construction, as well as construction support services. Additionally, the company manufactures, sells, and rents construction equipment; offers property development and logistics services; produces and distributes electricity generated from waste; and engages in the municipal solid waste management activities, as well as rents land, office buildings, and warehouses. It also sells oil through its community automated gas station. The company was formerly known as Sino-Thai Pressure Vessel & Iron Works and changed its name to STP&I Public Company Limited in 1995. STP&I Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THE-R.BK.summary: The Steel Public Company Limited engages in selling and transforming steel products in Thailand. It offers hot and cold rolled coils and sheets, electro galvanized steel coils and sheets, and hot dip galvanized steel coils and sheets; and light lip channel steel products, square and rectangular steel pipes, carbon steel pipes, hot rolled steel sheets and plates, checkered plates, angle steel bars, channel steel bars, galvanized steel pipes, square and flat bars, and cold round bars. The company also provides structural steel products, including H-beams, I-beams, wide flanges, and steel sheet piles; and steel bars, such as round and deformed steel bars. In addition, it produces and processes hot rolled steel into various products comprising slitting coils, steel pipes, and C-channels; and offers logistic services. The company was formerly known as Thai Yuan Metal Public Company Limited and changed its name to The Steel Public Company Limited in July 2014. The Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UEC-R.BK.summary: Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, shop fabrication, field installation, and erection of steel products and construction works in Thailand and internationally. It offers pressure vessels, including cryogenic/ISO tanks, columns/towers, shell and tube heat exchangers, spherical tanks, and vessels/drums, as well as LPG tanks comprising LPG aboveground and underground tanks, and transport/wagon tanks; and machinery parts, such as fan casings/pre heaters, water treatment parts, furnace casings, diverters, stacks/chimneys, and other products. The company also provides storage tanks, including API storage tanks and silo/hopper products; steel structures, piping shop fabrication products, and platforms/ladders; and mechanical installation services, such as piping and equipment installations, module works, and shut down/modification work services. Unimit Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.
